creator: Sparkles Stories LLC
descriptionHtml:
Take the world of Sparkle Stories with you for extended listening and enriched learning anywhere, anytime! Log in to your Sparkle Stories account to access all 1200+ stories and related content directly from your phone.

With the Sparkle Stories Android app you can:

• Stay inspired by seasonal content curated by Sparkle Stories
• Search the entire universe of sparkle stories content by topic, character, series, and more...
• Sync your storybox
• Save stories for offline listening on the plane or in remote corners of the earth
descriptionShort: Log in to your Sparkle Stories account to access stories anywhere anytime

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've added a new story suggestions banner added to your dashboard! This will contain new story suggestions for you, based on your previous listening experience.
We've added the ability to drag and drop stories in your Storybox! Now you can sort through your most loved stories in your Storybox. Simply navigate to your Storybox, and drag and drop those stories in the order you choose.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve been at work pouring love and attention into our Android app. We have some bug fixes and enhancements, as well as something new!
On our dashboard, you’ll notice a new feature! The ability to see and listen to our most popular stories based on our users! Check out and listen to the most popular stories, of the day, week, or year!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve been at work pouring love and attention into our Android app. We have some bug fixes and enhancements, as well as something new! A special feature "Support for peripheral media buttons" was added.  This will assist you connecting with third party media devices. For example bluetooth speakers, car stereos and more!

title: Sparkle Stories

descriptionShort: Log in to your Sparkle Stories account to access stories anywhere anytime

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've been lovingly at work on many bug fixes and feature enhancements in this release! Along with those, we added big new updates to our search functionality we're excited about! Based on user feedback, we made adjustments to how the browse button in the navigation works. Now you can click on the browse button from any page, and easily transition to the browse page. From there you can search for your next favorite story, even while happily listening to your current story!

descriptionShort: Log in to your Sparkle Stories account to access stories anywhere anytime

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release includes two features, both of which were requested by the Sparkle community.
- Chromecast integration. You can now send Sparkle Stories to Chromecast-enabled devices such as your Smart TV, Google Home, Nest Audio, and Nest Hub. This is great for screen-free listening.
- Reorder 'Offline Stories.' Now you can not only mark stories for 'offline listening,' you can reorder your offline playlist to better customize your listening experience. Perfect for travel!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release includes updating the app for Android 13, adding the resources section, fixing filters for displaying or hiding sensitive stories, and minor bug fixes.
